body_html:
Thanks @alextp, that helps. To follow-up,

  1. Would it be possible to add the subclass API to RefVariable in the next 1.xx release?
  2. Is tf.Variable.from_proto going to be retained in 2.0? (currently it returns a RefVariable object, but can it be extended to ResourceVariable too?)

In the meantime let me give tf.Variable.from_proto a try; will update the thread with my findings.
body_text:
Thanks @alextp, that helps. To follow-up,

Would it be possible to add the subclass API to RefVariable in the next 1.xx release?
Is tf.Variable.from_proto going to be retained in 2.0? (currently it returns a RefVariable object, but can it be extended to ResourceVariable too?)

In the meantime let me give tf.Variable.from_proto a try; will update the thread with my findings.
body:
Thanks @alextp, that helps. To follow-up,
1. Would it be possible to add the subclass API to `RefVariable` in the next 1.xx release?
2. Is `tf.Variable.from_proto` going to be retained in 2.0? ([currently](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.11/tensorflow/python/ops/variables.py#L900-L904) it returns a `RefVariable` object, but can it be extended to `ResourceVariable` too?)

In the meantime let me give `tf.Variable.from_proto` a try; will update the thread with my findings.
